mapper.insert: insert into member (userid, name, passwd, email, phoneNum, zipCode, mainAddress, detailAddress) values (#{userid}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{phoneNum}, #{zipCode}, #{mainAddress}, #{detailAddress})
mapper.select: select name from member where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}
